## SolidLineMaterial class

Material designed to render solid variable-width lines.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SolidLineMaterial extends THREE.RawShaderMaterial implements DisplacementFeature, FadingFeature 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(params)](./harp-materials.solidlinematerial._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new <code>SolidLineMaterial</code>. |
